name: Gunned Girl Battle
description:
Gunned Girl Battle is a simple shooting 3D game battle  and player has the ability to move in 3D space. The player can collect Item which award addition Energy, Heal Health, gain Gold and changing weapon. On the game progress you can freely choose where you can enter or join by talking to the npc. You can enter to PVP Arena, Labyrinth, and Monster Raid and you can customize your appearance by talking and entering to Change Appearance NPC

Note: if you use keyboard you can disable the Virtual joystick by Clicking Backspace.
To Move it you can use (W,A,S,D) and to fire and talk to NPC press (K) button and Dodge (L)button.
Camera Rotation hold (Q) or (R)
